folder: New York Avenue & Pacific Street, Brooklyn, NY
original_title: Brooklyn: New York Avenue - Pacific Street
text:
New York Avenue, east side, north from Pacific Street. On Atlantic Avenue is the elevated structure of the Long Island Rail-road, and beyond that is Public School No. 93.

September 12, 1940

P. L. Sperr

(2)

The residence at the N. E. corner of New York Avenue and Pacific Street, partially seen in view 1.

September 13, 1940

P. L. Sperr

folder: New York Avenue & Pacific Street, Brooklyn, NY
original_title: Brooklyn: New York Avenue - Pacific Street
text:
New York Avenue, east side, south from Pacific to Bergen Streets, showing a group of brownstone houses in the immediate foreground, and Public School No. 41, where the automobile is parked. Past that is the New York Avenue Methodist Episcopal Church.
View 2 shows the brownstone houses.

P. L. Sperr                     September, 1940
               Views 1,2
